Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class ConnectionToClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.ConnectionToClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventToClientNotifier, java.lang.Runnable
public class ConnectionToClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, EventToClientNotifier
This class is the remote view of the MVC patter. It is used to manage the connection with the client. It communicates with che controller to send information to the client and to send information from the client to the controller Implements EventToClientNotifier interface and Runnable interface.
Author:
Stefano Fossati
See Also:
EventToClientNotifier, Runnable

    • sendArrayLeaderCards

      public void sendArrayLeaderCards​(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards, boolean initialLeaderCards, Player currentPlayer, boolean isFinal)
      Description copied from interface: EventToClientNotifier
      Sends to the client/player the information of the leader cards.
      Specified by:
      sendArrayLeaderCards in interface EventToClientNotifier
      Parameters:
      leaderCards - The leader cards of the player.
      initialLeaderCards - Indicates the phase of the match in which the leader card are send. If is true the leader cards are to choose for the set up of the match. If is false the leader cards are to manage like in a normal turn.
      currentPlayer - The player send his own leader cards to.

    • sendNewTurn

      public void sendNewTurn​(int turnNumber, Market market, DevelopmentCard[][] developmentCards, Player[] players, FaithTrack faithTrack, boolean yourTurn)
      Description copied from interface: EventToClientNotifier
      Sends all the needed information to the client.
      Specified by:
      sendNewTurn in interface EventToClientNotifier
      Parameters:
      turnNumber - The number of the turn.
      market - The structure of the market.
      developmentCards - The structure of the development cards on the table with its information.
      players - The players with their public information.
      faithTrack - The state of the faith track.
      yourTurn - Indicates if the next turn is of the player to which is sent this event. If is true the next turn is of the client to which is sent this event. If is false the next turn is of another client.

    • sendReorganizeDeposit

      public void sendReorganizeDeposit​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> marketResources, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState, boolean isAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> typeAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalState)
      Description copied from interface: EventToClientNotifier
      Sends the request to reorganize the deposit to the client.
      Specified by:
      sendReorganizeDeposit in interface EventToClientNotifier
      Parameters:
      marketResources - The resources take from the market.
      depositState - The deposit state of the player that have to reorganize the deposit.
      isAdditional - Indicates if there is or there are additional deposits send.
      typeAdditional - The type of the additional deposits send.
      additionalState - The state of the additional deposits send.

      lorenzo - Indicates if is a single player match.
      lorenzoPosition - Lorenzo position if is a single player match.
      market - The market of the match.
